MARTHA

Project redesign

Engagement period Jan 2020

Martha is a renowned gospel artist known for her soulful and uplifting music. She has inspired countless individuals through her powerful performances and heartfelt lyrics, spreading a message of hope and faith. Her work in the project redesign has brought a fresh perspective and a renewed sense of purpose to the gospel music scene.
